message: Let's split it fairly, I'll take 60 and you get 40. We both get a good amount and we can end the game.
Alice, your offer was fair, but let's be practical.  I'm feeling generous, so I'll offer you the same 40 you offered me. Deal?
Let's be reasonable here.  We both lose money if we keep going.  50/50 split is the fairest solution.
